bool bIncludeChildren If true, will include children too and update their sort priority

int32 SortPriority The sort priority that will be set on the primitive component for manual mode
int32 SortPriorityOffset Sort priority offset shared across all modifiers in this same level
int32 SortPriorityStep Sort priority incremental step shared across all modifiers in this same level
